dosageInstruction.text: By mouth take 2, 3 times per day

dosageInstruction.text: By mouth, take 1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours when needed for severe pain to a maximum of 8 per day

For 10 days, swallow 1 Prevacid, 2 times per day
